reviewText: While this DVD gives practical advice on meditation in general, along with advice on doing a practice with your children, there are no guided meditations to practice with your children, something I expected, from the title.

As a new mother with prior exposure to meditation, Rebecca's DVD offered some fantastic tools to practice with my child and also served as a great refresher on mediation in general. I would highly recommend for new or experienced meditators!
Well done, a must for young parents!
